channel.title: New at The Book of Secret Knowledge

item.title: add 'OWASP Threat Dragon'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: OWASP Threat Dragon - is a tool used to create threat model diagrams and to record possible threats.

item.title: add 'FreeBSD Journal'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: FreeBSD Journal - it is a great list of periodical magazines about FreeBSD and other important things.

item.title: Optimize GetASN()
item.description: _asn=$($_curl_base -ks -m "$_timeout" "http://ip-api.com/line/${_ip}?fields=as")

item.title: fix typo
item.description:
# User
# Group:

item.title: add new 'find' oneliners
item.description:
###### Find files and directories for specific user/group
# User:
find /etc -type f -user -name "*.conf"
# Group:
find /opt -group
find /etc -type f -group -iname "*.conf"
```
###### Find files and directories for all without specific user/group
```bash
# User:
find . \! -user -print
# Group:
find . \! -group
###### Looking for files/directories that only have certain permission
# User:
find . -user -perm -u+rw # -rw-r--r--
find /home -user $(whoami) -perm 777 # -rwxrwxrwx
find /home -type d -group -perm 755 # -rwxr-xr-x

item.title: add 'h2spec' and 'h2t'
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: h2spec - is a conformance testing tool for HTTP/2 implementation.

  :small_orange_diamond: h2t - is a simple tool to help sysadmins to hardening their websites.

item.title: add new stuff
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: htop explained - explanation of everything you can see in htop/top on Linux.

  :small_orange_diamond: SSH Handshake Explained - is a relatively brief description of the SSH handshake.

  :small_orange_diamond: POSTGRESQLCO.NF - your postgresql.conf documentation and recommendations.

  :small_orange_diamond: devops-interview-questions - contains interview questions on various DevOps and SRE related topics.

item.title: fix typo
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: Offensive Security Bookmarks - security bookmarks collection, all things that author need to pass OSCP.

item.title: add 'OSCPRepo'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: OSCPRepo - is a list of resources that author have been gathering in preparation for the OSCP.

item.title: add 'busybox' one-liners
item.description:
* [busybox](#tool-busybox)
```
---
##### Tool: [busybox](https://www.busybox.net/)
###### Static HTTP web server
```bash
busybox httpd -p $PORT -h $HOME [-c httpd.conf]

item.title: add new resources
item.description:
:small_orange_diamond: vedetta - OpenBSD router boilerplate.

  :small_orange_diamond: privacy-respecting - curated list of privacy respecting services and software.

  :small_orange_diamond: Beginner-Network-Pentesting - notes for beginner network pentesting course.

item.title: #137 - add 'Shell plugins' section
item.description:
##### :black_small_square: Shell plugins


  :small_orange_diamond: z - tracks the folder you use the most and allow you to jump, without having to type the whole path.

  :small_orange_diamond: fzf - is a general-purpose command-line fuzzy finder.

  :small_orange_diamond: zsh-autosuggestions - Fish-like autosuggestions for Zsh.

  :small_orange_diamond: zsh-syntax-highlighting - Fish shell like syntax highlighting for Zsh.

item.title: add 'netsniff-ng'
item.description: :small_orange_diamond: netsniff-ng - is a Swiss army knife for your daily Linux network plumbing if you will.

item.description:
